settings.title: Materials
settings.content: Emma smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Emma offers the comfiest sleep possible. Emma mattresses offer comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-US® certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.

settings.note: *For queen sizes only. All prices and information from public sources listed as of Sept 1, 2023. Information may not reflect updated prices and promotions.

settings.desc:
Enjoy the best value for premium comfort

  • 53% discount on our newest 13-inch Emma Hybrid Comfort
  • 53% discount on 2 Premium Cooling Pillows
  • 53% discount on our Emma Breathable Mattress Protector
settings.caption_content: We offer an excellent sleep system that ensures a perfect night's sleep.

settings.heading: Why combine Emma products?
settings.content: Our team of sleep experts has developed complementary products to create a comprehensive sleep system that serves comfort, support, breathability, and durability.

settings.heading: Perfect Sleep Bundle
settings.content: Our bundle prepares you for an absolutely perfect night's sleep through the synergy of our newest 13-inch Hybrid Comfort Mattress, Premium Cooling Pillows and Breathable Mattress Cover

settings.heading: Emma Premium Cooling Pillow
settings.content: No more waking up in a sweat! The Cooling Pillow features our special Thermosync foam, capturing excess heat for optimum sleep temperature. A regulated temperature favorises deep sleep phases and promotes a restful sleep without micro-awakenings throughout the night.

settings.heading: Hybrid Comfort Mattress
settings.content: Enjoy zero motion transfer and exceptional breathability enabled by its open-pored Airgocell foams, facilitating heat dissipation for an impeccable night's sleep at your ideal temperature.

settings.heading: Breathable Mattress Cover
settings.content: Keep your mattress fresh & brand-new. Our Breathable Mattress Protector Tri-Protect™ Action will protect it from life's spills, allergens and dust mites while ensuring a good airflow.

settings.title: Breathable and moisture-wicking Top cover
settings.content: The Emma cover is soft-to-touch, making it very comfortable to lie on. Built with light fibers, our cover wicks away moisture away and prevents heat from getting trapped on the surface.

settings.title: The Breezy Airgocell® foam
settings.content: Our signature Point Elastic Airgocell technology absorbs and releases excess body heat and moisture, creating an ideal sleeping environment for peaceful sleep.

settings.title: The Cool foam layer that isolates motion
settings.content: Find comfort in any sleeping position. Memory foam molds to the unique shape of your body for even pressure distribution and provides great motion isolation so you can sleep undisturbed, even with a fussy partner

settings.title: The Supportive HRX foam
settings.content: Durable HRX foam supports you with just the right level of firmness, without hollows or bumps. Lie back and move freely until you've found your position for a deep sleep.

settings.title: The Ergonomic, 7-Zone edge-to-edge pocket springs
settings.content: Say goodbye to restless nights! Our individually-wrapped coils are designed to enhance airflow and provide the optimum level of tension and bounce all over the mattress — strong enough to support sleepers of all shape and size. Rest comfortably as our pocket springs adapt to your spine for longer and deeper restorative sleep.

settings.title: The Stabilizing layer
settings.content: Long-lasting mattresses need a good foundation. Our base is built to last, providing added stability for decades of quality sleep.

settings.title: The Resistant, anti-slip, lower cover with handles
settings.content: Innovative mattress lower cover, designed with exceptional durability and a convenient handle for effortless maneuverability.

settings.heading: Emma Hybrid Comfort - Layer by Layer

settings.title: How does the Hybrid Comfort feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: On a 1-10 scale (soft to firm), the Hybrid Comfort mattress strikes an ideal equilibrium 6 (medium firm). This translates to experiencing the plush, cloud-like comfort of contemporary memory foam, all the while receiving precisely the necessary support to safeguard your back and hips as you enjoy a restful night's sleep.

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same
settings.subtitle: Experience rave-worthy comfort on a mattress that suits your every sleep need

settings.heading: Mai Le, Mom
settings.content: We've had our emma mattress for about 2 weeks and holy smokes I can attest to the zero partner disturbance... because I co-sleep and even with me moving around getting up it doesn't disturb my baby girl 🙌

settings.heading: Alex Liang, Interior Designer
settings.content: No bedroom redesign would be complete without a new mattress! And we’ve been really enjoying my new Emma Original. It’s soft, yet supportive and keeps us comfortable and cool all night long. I also love that the entire cover of the mattress can be removed and machine washed, to keep the mattress fresh and new.

settings.heading: Lee Sartori, Author
settings.content: I've fallen in love with my Emma Mattress 😍. The Mattress sort of expands when you open it which made me think it would be way too soft. Surprise, it is actually very firm while keeping your sleep comfy and soft 😴💕. Because it's a memory foam mattress, you can sleep (or crochet) comfortably next to someone without disturbing them at all which is fantastic. All in all, I highly recommend!

settings.heading: Aya G,  Content Creator
settings.content: Emma has, no joke, given me the best sleep quality I've ever had (!!!) - I get to sleep straight through the night without being disturbed by any movements or noises, I no longer get any shoulder/back aches and the temperature is always *just* right. I now wake up happier and more energized to take on my day. ⚡️

settings.heading: Sylvana Carda, Mom
settings.content: Even superheroes sleep at night 🦸🏻‍♂️💫 Baby sleeps in his bed, but in the morning he joins us in our bed and I share my pillow with him. After using the pillow, I have much less neck pain unlike before when I wake up in the middle of the night and need to adjust my pillow several times.

settings.heading: Lena Almeida, Mom
settings.content: I couldn’t be happier! The mattress and pillows are cool, breathable and offer just the right support to help me drift off to dreamland. 💤 The best part? I barely feel my husband’s movement throughout the night, which has improved the quality of my sleep enormously.

settings.heading: Orsida Luzati, Mom
settings.content: Who knew that a new mattress would have such a positive impact in our lives! The girls have found their favorite bed– soft and comfortable mattress (with motion isolating foam) and a 3-layer pillow with option to remove a layer for best comfort💗

settings.heading: Jessica Tyler, Content Creator
settings.content: I no longer wake up feeling like I’ve aged several years overnight with back pain! The support and comfort of this bed is seriously unmatched. Our bedroom has easily become my favorite room in the house - I already can’t wait to get back into bed tonight! 💤

settings.title: High-quality support for heavier sleepers!
settings.content: As a heavier sleeper, the Emma Climax provides excellent support for me, and i've been feeling sooo rejuvanated in the AMs. I love that I don't have to sleep on a rock (this one is both soft and supportive at the same time!) to feel like my mattress can keep me feeling solid.
settings.author: Katherine M.

settings.title: Staying cool and comfortable
settings.content: This purchase has helped a lot with my night sweats - said goodbye to my decades-old mattress and really happy with this one. 10/10
settings.author: Matthew R.

settings.title: The ultimate mattress for couples with different preferences!
settings.content: The hubby is a restless sleeper and tosses and turns a lot at night. I'm glad to report that I've been feeling less disruption through the night. The climax feels balanced and comfortable for us both.
settings.author: Sophia L.

settings.title: Great for couples
settings.content: We've tried orthopedic mattresses in the past, but returned it because they're TOO firm. I prefer soft ones, while my husband prefers firm. For some strange reason, this mattress just works for the both of us. His back pain's gone and I've been sleeping like a log every night!
settings.author: Donna C.

settings.title: Uninterrupted sleep all night
settings.content: This was recommended to me by my friend since I've been waking up in the middle of the night with my old mattress. So glad I listened cuz now I've been sleeping straight and waking up without a sweat
settings.author: Nicole W

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: Unbeatable value for exceptional quality!
settings.content: Crazy how we got such a steal at this price point. Seriously the most comfortable sleeping experience ever.
settings.author: Olivia K.

settings.title: I can't wait for bedtime now!
settings.content: Sharing a conventional mattress that is sagging, with a long legged whippet was a disaster - most mornings I fell out of bed with him pushing me out. I now wake up every morning with much less pain and even the dog seems to love it!
settings.author: Judy K.

settings.title: Best sleeping with Emma
settings.content: My wife and I love this mattress because we never wake up during sleeping time, and we don't get lower back pain after we wake up.
settings.author: James L.
